A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi Is Fantastic. Though the first half has some pacing issues\, the second and third act make up for it with heart wrenching emotion\, mind blowing action scenes\, and so much more. This is a unique Star Wars movie\, and is now ranking as my third favorite. Please do yourself a favor\, ignore the user reviews\, and see this fucking movie.
